comment:
* A sub-class of {@link HandwritingGesture} for selecting an area of text using single rectangle. * This class holds the information required for selection of text in * toolkit widgets like {@link TextView}. *

Note: This selects all text within the given area. To select a range between * two areas, use {@link SelectRangeGesture}.

variables.name: CREATOR
variables.comment: * Used to make this class parcelable.

methods.name: public int getGranularity()
methods.comment:
* Returns Granular level on which text should be operated.
     * @see #GRANULARITY_CHARACTER
     * @see #GRANULARITY_WORD

methods.name: public RectF getSelectionArea()
methods.comment:
* Returns the Selection area {@link RectF} in screen coordinates.
     *
     * Getter for selection area set with {@link Builder#setSelectionArea(RectF)}.

methods.name: public void writeToParcel(@NonNull Parcel dest, int flags)
methods.comment:
* Used to package this object into a {@link Parcel}.
     *
     * @param dest The {@link Parcel} to be written.
     * @param flags The flags used for parceling.

methodNames: public void writeToParcel(@NonNull Parcel dest, int flags)
